title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Gunman in truck smashes into Michigan church and opens fire, killing at least 4 and injuring 8
items.description: The FBI is leading the investigation and considered it an “act of targeted violence,” said Ruben Coleman, a special agent in charge for the bureau.

items.title: Tactics used in the Michigan church attack resemble a new ‘hybrid threat’ meant to maximize damage, security expert says
items.description: "That all creates chaos. It could create what we call a fatal funnel trying to drive people towards one location."

items.title: David Marriott reveals the correct way to pronounce the popular hotel chain—and you’ve probably been doing it wrong
items.description: The Marriott empire traces back to 1927, when David's grandfather, J. Willard Marriott, opened a nine-stool A&W root beer stand in Washington, D.C.

items.title: Investors are betting big on ‘prediction markets’ Kalshi and Polymarket—will the gamble pay off?
items.description: The two startups generated huge buzz by accurately predicting the 2024 election results. Their young founders still face long odds.

items.title: What Taylor Swift taught RBC CEO Dave McKay
items.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.
